languages.text: {n}Арджента опускает оружие. С ее губ срывается вздох.{/n} "Этот еретик — он намеренно пытался разбудить мой гнев. {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}Напрасно{/d} он думает, что может вертеть избранницей святой Терры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента опускает оружие. С ее губ срывается вздох.{/n} "Этот еретик — он намеренно пытался разбудить мой гнев. Напрасно он думает, что может вертеть избранницей святой Терры".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента опускает оружие. С ее губ срывается вздох.{/n} "Этот еретик — он намеренно пытался разбудить мой гнев. {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}Напрасно{/d} он думает, что может вертеть избранницей святой Терры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは武器を下ろした。息が彼女の唇から漏れる。{/n}「あの異端者は故意に我の怒りを引き出そうとしていた。彼は聖なる地球の選ばれし者を操れると思ったようだが、それは{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}間違い{/d}だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは武器を下ろした。息が彼女の唇から漏れる。{/n}「あの異端者は故意に我の怒りを引き出そうとしていた。彼は聖なる地球の選ばれし者を操れると思ったようだが、それは{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}間違い{/d}だ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔放下了武器，吐了口气。{/n}“那个异端分子打算故意激起我的怒火。如果他以为他能操纵神圣泰拉的神选之子，那他{d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}大错特错{/d}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔放下了武器，吐了口气。{/n}“那个异端分子打算故意激起我的怒火。如果他以为他能操纵神圣泰拉的神选之子，那他大错特错。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta abaisse son arme. Un soupir ténu s'échappe de ses lèvres.{/n} « Cet hérétique cherche à attiser les flammes de ma colère. Il a {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}tort{/d} de croire qu'il peut manipuler à sa guise l'élue de la Sainte Terra. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta abaisse son arme. Un soupir ténu s'échappe de ses lèvres.{/n} « Cet hérétique cherche à attiser les flammes de ma colère. Il a tort de croire qu'il peut manipuler à sa guise l'élue de la Sainte Terra. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta baja el arma y deja de contener el aliento.{/n} «Ese hereje intentaba despertar mi ira. {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}Se equivoca{/d} al pensar que puede manipular a la elegida de la Sagrada Terra».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta baja el arma y deja de contener el aliento.{/n} «Ese hereje intentaba despertar mi ira. Se equivoca al pensar que puede manipular a la elegida de la Sagrada Terra».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta senkt ihre Waffe und atmet aus.{/n} "Dieser Ketzer wollte absichtlich meine Wut entfachen. Er {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}irrt{/d} sich, wenn er glaubt, er könne die Auserkorene des Heiligen Terra manipulieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta senkt ihre Waffe und atmet aus.{/n} "Dieser Ketzer wollte absichtlich meine Wut entfachen. Er irrt sich, wenn er glaubt, er könne die Auserkorene des Heiligen Terra manipulieren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta silahını indiriyor. Dudaklarının arasından nefesi kaçıveriyor.{/n} "O kâfir, kasten öfkemi uyandırmaya çalışıyordu. Kutsal Terra'nın seçilmişlerinden birini dilediği gibi kullanabileceğini sanıyorsa çok {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}yanılıyor{/d}."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta lowers her weapon. A breath escapes her lips.{/n} "That heretic was deliberately trying to awaken my anger. He is {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}wrong{/d} to think that he can manipulate the chosen one of Holy Terra."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta silahını indiriyor. Dudaklarının arasından bir nefes veriyor.{/n} "O kâfir, kasten öfkemi uyandırmaya çalışıyordu. Kutsal Terra'nın seçilmişlerinden birini dilediği gibi kullanabileceğini sanıyorsa çok {d|Encyclopedia:CompArgenta_SupportedFire}yanılıyor{/d}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
